elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Finish the following three sentence beginnings:

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Market equilibrium is achieved when ...
elements.correctAnswer: ... offer as much of a product as is in demand.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: The price therefore remains stable if supply and demand remain stable for a long time.

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: In concrete terms, sentences 1 and 2 mean that a market equilibrium exists if, for example, a bakery always sells at a certain price shortly before closing time.
elements.correctAnswer: ... the last loaf of bread is sold.
